00288 template< typename T >
00289 class Gen_fpage : public T
00290 {
00291 public:
00292   enum Type
00293   {
00294     Special = L4_FPAGE_SPECIAL << 4,
00295     Memory  = L4_FPAGE_MEMORY << 4,
00296     Io      = L4_FPAGE_IO << 4,
00297     Obj     = L4_FPAGE_OBJ << 4
00298   };
00299 
00300   enum Map_type
00301   {
00302     Map   = L4_MAP_ITEM_MAP,
00303     Grant = L4_MAP_ITEM_GRANT,
00304   };
00305 
00306   enum Cacheopt
00307   {
00308     None     = 0,
00309     Cached   = L4_FPAGE_CACHEABLE << 4,
00310     Buffered = L4_FPAGE_BUFFERABLE << 4,
00311     Uncached = L4_FPAGE_UNCACHEABLE << 4
00312   };
00313 
00314   enum Continue
00315   {
00316     Single   = 0,
00317     Last     = 0,
00318     More     = L4_ITEM_CONT,
00319     Compound = L4_ITEM_CONT,
00320   };
00321 
00322 private:
00323   Gen_fpage(Type type, l4_addr_t base, int order,
00324             unsigned char rights,
00325             l4_addr_t snd_base,
00326             Map_type map_type,
00327             Cacheopt cache, Continue cont)
00328   : T(L4_ITEM_MAP | (snd_base & (~0UL << 10)) | l4_umword_t(map_type) | l4_umword_t(cache)
00329       | l4_umword_t(cont),
00330       base | l4_umword_t(type) | rights | (l4_umword_t(order) << 6))
00331   {}
00332 
00333 public:
00334   Gen_fpage() : T(0, 0) {}
00335   Gen_fpage(l4_fpage_t const &fp, l4_addr_t snd_base = 0,
00336             Map_type map_type = Map,
00337             Cacheopt cache = None, Continue cont = Last)
00338   : T(L4_ITEM_MAP | (snd_base & (~0UL << 10)) | l4_umword_t(map_type) | l4_umword_t(cache)
00339     | l4_umword_t(cont),
00340     fp.raw)
00341   {}
00342 
00343   Gen_fpage(L4::Cap<void> cap, unsigned rights)
00344   : T(L4_ITEM_MAP | Map | (rights & 0xf0), cap.fpage(rights).raw)
00345   {}
00346 
00347   static Gen_fpage<T> obj(l4_addr_t base, int order,
00348                           unsigned char rights,
00349                           l4_addr_t snd_base = 0,
00350                           Map_type map_type = Map,
00351                           Continue cont = Last)
00352   { return Gen_fpage<T>(Obj, base << 12, order, rights, snd_base, map_type, None, cont); }
00353   static Gen_fpage<T> mem(l4_addr_t base, int order,
00354                           unsigned char rights,
00355                           l4_addr_t snd_base = 0,
00356                           Map_type map_type = Map,
00357                           Cacheopt cache = None, Continue cont = Last)
00358   { return Gen_fpage<T>(Memory, base, order, rights, snd_base,
00359                         map_type, cache, cont); }
00360   static Gen_fpage<T> io(l4_addr_t base, int order,
00361                           unsigned char rights,
00362                           l4_addr_t snd_base = 0,
00363                           Map_type map_type = Map,
00364                           Continue cont = Last)
00365     { return Gen_fpage<T>(Io, base << 12, order, rights, snd_base, map_type, None, cont); }
00366 
00367   unsigned order() const { return (T::_data >> 6) & 0x3f; }
00368   unsigned snd_order() const { return (T::_data >> 6) & 0x3f; }
00369   unsigned rcv_order() const { return (T::_base >> 6) & 0x3f; }
00370   l4_addr_t base() const { return T::_data & (~0UL << 12); }
00371   l4_addr_t snd_base() const { return T::_base & (~0UL << 10); }
00372   void snd_base(l4_addr_t b) { T::_base = (T::_base & ~(~0UL << 10)) | (b & (~0UL << 10)); }
00373 
00374   bool is_valid() const { return T::_base & L4_ITEM_MAP; }
00375   // A cap has been mapped
00376   bool cap_received() const { return (T::_base & 0x3e) == 0x38; }
00377   // the label out of an IPC gate has been received, L4_RCV_ITEM_LOCAL_ID
00378   // must be specified, and the IPC gate must be local to the receiver
00379   // (i.e., the target thread of the IPC gate is in the same task as the
00380   // receiving thread)
00381   bool id_received() const { return (T::_base & 0x3e) == 0x3c; }
00382   // Sender and receiver are in the same task, set only iff
00383   // L4_RCV_ITEM_LOCAL_ID has been specified by the receiver, the value
00384   // delivered is the cap-index (in the task)
00385   bool local_id_received() const { return (T::_base & 0x3e) == 0x3e; }
00386   l4_umword_t data() const { return T::_data; }
00387   l4_umword_t base_x() const { return T::_base; }
00388 };
00389

00391 typedef Gen_fpage<Snd_item> Snd_fpage;
00392 typedef Gen_fpage<Buf_item> Rcv_fpage;

00394 #ifdef L4_CXX_IPC_SUPPORT_STRINGS
00395 template <typename T, typename B>
00396 class Gen_string : public T
00397 {
00398 public:
00399   Gen_string() : T(0,0) {}
00400   Gen_string(B buf, unsigned long size)
00401   : T(size << 10, l4_umword_t(buf))
00402   {}
00403 
00404   unsigned long len() const { return T::_base >> 10; }
00405 };
00406 
00407 typedef Gen_string<Snd_item, void const *> Snd_string;
00408 typedef Gen_string<Buf_item, void *> Rcv_string;

00412 template< typename T, template <typename X> class B > struct Generic_va_type : public B<T>
00413 {
00414   enum { Id = B<T>::Id };
00415   typedef B<T> ID;
00416   typedef T const &Ret_value;
00417   typedef T Value;
00418 
00419   static Ret_value value(void const *d)
00420   { return *reinterpret_cast<Value const *>(d); }
00421 
00422   static void const *addr_of(Value const &v) { return &v; }
00423 
00424   static unsigned size(void const *) { return sizeof(T); }
00425 
00426   static L4_varg_type unsigned_id() { return (L4_varg_type)(Id & ~L4_VARG_TYPE_SIGN); }
00427   static L4_varg_type signed_id() { return (L4_varg_type)(Id | L4_VARG_TYPE_SIGN); }
00428   static L4_varg_type id() { return (L4_varg_type)Id; }
00429 };
00430 
00431 template< typename T > struct Va_type_id;
00432 template<> struct Va_type_id<l4_umword_t>  { enum { Id = L4_VARG_TYPE_UMWORD }; };
00433 template<> struct Va_type_id<l4_mword_t>   { enum { Id = L4_VARG_TYPE_MWORD }; };
00434 template<> struct Va_type_id<l4_fpage_t>   { enum { Id = L4_VARG_TYPE_FPAGE }; };
00435 template<> struct Va_type_id<void>         { enum { Id = L4_VARG_TYPE_NIL }; };
00436 template<> struct Va_type_id<char const *> { enum { Id = L4_VARG_TYPE_STRING }; };
00437 
00438 template< typename T > struct Va_type;
00439 
00440 template<> struct Va_type<l4_umword_t> : public Generic_va_type<l4_umword_t, Va_type_id> {};
00441 template<> struct Va_type<l4_mword_t> : public Generic_va_type<l4_mword_t, Va_type_id> {};
00442 template<> struct Va_type<l4_fpage_t> : public Generic_va_type<l4_fpage_t, Va_type_id> {};
00443 
00444 template<> struct Va_type<void>
00445 {
00446   typedef void Ret_value;
00447   typedef void Value;
00448 
00449   static void const *addr_of(void) { return 0; }
00450 
00451   static void value(void const *) {}
00452   static L4_varg_type id() { return L4_VARG_TYPE_NIL; }
00453   static unsigned size(void const *) { return 0; }
00454 };
00455 
00456 template<> struct Va_type<char const *>
00457 {
00458   typedef char const *Ret_value;
00459   typedef char const *Value;
00460 
00461   static void const *addr_of(Value v) { return v; }
00462 
00463   static L4_varg_type id() { return L4_VARG_TYPE_STRING; }
00464   static unsigned size(void const *s)
00465   {
00466     char const *_s = reinterpret_cast<char const *>(s);
00467     int l = 1;
00468     while (*_s)
00469       {
00470   ++_s; ++l;
00471       }
00472     return l;
00473   }
00474 
00475   static Ret_value value(void const *d) { return (char const *)d; }
00476 };
00477 
00478 
00479 class Varg
00480 {
00481 private:
00482   l4_umword_t _tag;
00483   char const *_d;
00484 
00485 public:
00486 
00487   typedef l4_umword_t Tag;
00488 
00489   L4_varg_type type() const { return (L4_varg_type)(_tag & 0xff); }
00490   int length() const { return _tag >> 16; }
00491 
00492   void tag(Tag tag) { _tag = tag; }
00493   Tag tag() const { return _tag; }
00494   void data(char const *d) { _d = d; }
00495 
00496   char const *data() const { return _d; }
00497   char const *&data() { return _d; }
00498 
00499   Varg() : _tag(0), _d(0) {}
00500 
00501   Varg(L4_varg_type t, void const  *v, int len)
00502   : _tag(t | ((l4_mword_t)len << 16)), _d((char const *)v)
00503   {}
00504 
00505   template< typename V >
00506   typename Va_type<V>::Ret_value value() const
00507   { return Va_type<V>::value(_d); }
00508 
00509 
00510   template< typename T >
00511   bool is_of() const { return Va_type<T>::id() == type(); }
00512 
00513   bool is_nil() const { return is_of<void>(); }
00514 
00515   bool is_of_int() const
00516   { return (type() & ~L4_VARG_TYPE_SIGN) == L4_VARG_TYPE_UMWORD; }
00517 
00518   template< typename T >
00519   bool get_value(typename Va_type<T>::Value *v) const
00520   {
00521     if (!is_of<T>())
00522       return false;
00523 
00524     *v = Va_type<T>::value(_d);
00525     return true;
00526   }
00527 
00528   template< typename T >
00529   void set_value(void const *d)
00530   {
00531     typedef Va_type<T> Vt;
00532     _tag = Vt::id() | (Vt::size(d) << 16);
00533     _d = (char const *)d;
00534   }
00535 
00536 };
00537 
00538 template<typename T>
00539 class Varg_t : public Varg
00540 {
00541 public:
00542   typedef typename Va_type<T>::Value Value;
00543   explicit Varg_t(Value v) : Varg()
00544   { _data = v; set_value<T>(Va_type<T>::addr_of(_data)); }
00545 
00546 private:
00547   Value _data;
00548 };

00550 namespace Utcb_stream_check
00551 {
00552   static bool check_utcb_data_offset(unsigned sz)
00553   { return sz > sizeof(l4_umword_t) * L4_UTCB_GENERIC_DATA_SIZE; }
00554 }
00555 
00556 
00572 class Istream
00573 {
00574 public:
00586   Istream(l4_utcb_t *utcb)
00587   : _tag(), _utcb(utcb),
00588     _current_msg(reinterpret_cast<char*>(l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr)),
00589     _pos(0), _current_buf(0)
00590   {}
00591 
00596   void reset()
00597   {
00598     _pos = 0;
00599     _current_buf = 0;
00600     _current_msg = reinterpret_cast<char*>(l4_utcb_mr_u(_utcb)->mr);
00601   }
00602 
00606   template< typename T >
00607   bool has_more()
00608   {
00609     unsigned apos = cxx::Type_traits<T>::align(_pos);
00610     return apos + sizeof(T) <= _tag.words() * sizeof(l4_umword_t);
00611   }
00612 
00621 
00630   template< typename T >
00631   void get(T *buf, unsigned long size)
00632   {
00633     size *= sizeof(T);
00634     _pos = cxx::Type_traits<T>::align(_pos);
00635     if (Utcb_stream_check::check_utcb_data_offset(_pos + size))
00636       return;
00637 
00638     __builtin_memcpy(buf, _current_msg + _pos, size);
00639     _pos += size;
00640   }
00641 
00642 
00647   template< typename T >
00648   void skip(unsigned long size)
00649   {
00650     size *= sizeof(T);
00651     _pos = cxx::Type_traits<T>::align(_pos);
00652     if (Utcb_stream_check::check_utcb_data_offset(_pos + size))
00653       return;
00654     _pos += size;
00655   }
00656 
00670   template< typename T >
00671   void get(Msg_ptr<T> const &buf, unsigned long size = 1)
00672   {
00673     size *= sizeof(T);
00674     _pos = cxx::Type_traits<T>::align(_pos);
00675     if (Utcb_stream_check::check_utcb_data_offset(_pos + size))
00676       return;
00677 
00678     buf.set(reinterpret_cast<T*>(_current_msg + _pos));
00679     _pos += size;
00680   }
00681 
00682 
00689   template< typename T >
00690   void get(T &v)
00691   {
00692     _pos = cxx::Type_traits<T>::align(_pos);
00693     if (Utcb_stream_check::check_utcb_data_offset(_pos + sizeof(T)))
00694       {
00695   v = T();
00696         return;
00697       }
00698     v = *(reinterpret_cast<T*>(_current_msg + _pos));
00699     _pos += sizeof(T);
00700   }
00701 
00702 
00703   bool get(Ipc::Varg *va)
00704   {
00705     Ipc::Varg::Tag t;
00706     if (!has_more<Ipc::Varg::Tag>())
00707       {
00708         va->tag(0);
00709   return 0;
00710       }
00711     get(t);
00712     va->tag(t);
00713     get(msg_ptr(va->data()), va->length());
00714 
00715     return 1;
00716   }
00717 
00726   l4_msgtag_t tag() const { return _tag; }
00727 
00728 
00737   l4_msgtag_t &tag() { return _tag; }
00738 
00740 
00745   inline bool put(Buf_item const &);
00746 
00751   inline bool put(Small_buf const &);
00752 
00753 
00758 
00766   inline l4_msgtag_t wait(l4_umword_t *src)
00767   { return wait(src, L4_IPC_NEVER); }
00768 
00777   inline l4_msgtag_t wait(l4_umword_t *src, l4_timeout_t timeout);
00778 
00786   inline l4_msgtag_t receive(l4_cap_idx_t src)
00787   { return receive(src, L4_IPC_NEVER); }
00788   inline l4_msgtag_t receive(l4_cap_idx_t src, l4_timeout_t timeout);
00789 
00791 
00795   inline l4_utcb_t *utcb() const { return _utcb; }
00796 
00797 protected:
00798   l4_msgtag_t _tag;
00799   l4_utcb_t *_utcb;
00800   char *_current_msg;
00801   unsigned _pos;
00802   unsigned char _current_buf;
00803 };
00804 
00805 class Istream_copy : public Istream
00806 {
00807 private:
00808   l4_msg_regs_t _mrs;
00809 
00810 public:
00811   Istream_copy(Istream const &o) : Istream(o), _mrs(*l4_utcb_mr_u(o.utcb()))
00812   {
00813     // do some reverse mr to utcb trickery
00814     _utcb = (l4_utcb_t*)((l4_addr_t)&_mrs - (l4_addr_t)l4_utcb_mr_u((l4_utcb_t*)0));
00815     _current_msg = reinterpret_cast<char*>(l4_utcb_mr_u(_utcb)->mr);
00816   }
00817 
00818 };
00819 
00820 template< typename T >
00821 inline
00822 T read(Istream &s) { T t; s >> t; return t; }
00823 
00824 
00840 class Ostream
00841 {
00842 public:
00846   Ostream(l4_utcb_t *utcb)
00847   : _tag(), _utcb(utcb),
00848     _current_msg(reinterpret_cast<char *>(l4_utcb_mr_u(_utcb)->mr)),
00849     _pos(0), _current_item(0)
00850   {}
00851 
00855   void reset()
00856   {
00857     _pos = 0;
00858     _current_item = 0;
00859     _current_msg = reinterpret_cast<char*>(l4_utcb_mr_u(_utcb)->mr);
00860   }
00861 
00871 
00877   template< typename T >
00878   void put(T *buf, unsigned long size)
00879   {
00880     size *= sizeof(T);
00881     _pos = cxx::Type_traits<T>::align(_pos);
00882     if (Utcb_stream_check::check_utcb_data_offset(_pos + size))
00883       return;
00884 
00885     __builtin_memcpy(_current_msg + _pos, buf, size);
00886     _pos += size;
00887   }
00888 
00893   template< typename T >
00894   bool put(T const &v)
00895   {
00896     _pos = cxx::Type_traits<T>::align(_pos);
00897     if (Utcb_stream_check::check_utcb_data_offset(_pos + sizeof(T)))
00898       return false;
00899 
00900     *(reinterpret_cast<T*>(_current_msg + _pos)) = v;
00901     _pos += sizeof(T);
00902     return true;
00903   }
00904 
00905   int put(Varg const &va)
00906   {
00907     put(va.tag());
00908     put(va.data(), va.length());
00909 
00910     return 0;
00911   }
00912 
00913   template< typename T >
00914   int put(Varg_t<T> const &va)
00915   { return put(static_cast<Varg const &>(va)); }
00916 
00921   l4_msgtag_t tag() const { return _tag; }
00922 
00927   l4_msgtag_t &tag() { return _tag; }
00928 
00930 
00935   inline bool put_snd_item(Snd_item const &);
00936 
00937 
00942 
00947   inline l4_msgtag_t send(l4_cap_idx_t dst, long proto = 0, unsigned flags = 0);
00948 
00950 
00954   inline l4_utcb_t *utcb() const { return _utcb; }
00955 #if 0
00956 
00959   unsigned long tell() const
00960   {
00961     register unsigned w = (_pos + sizeof(l4_umword_t)-1) / sizeof(l4_umword_t);
00962     w -= _current_item * 2;
00963     _tag = l4_msgtag(0, w, _current_item, 0);
00964   }
00965 #endif
00966 public:
00967   l4_msgtag_t prepare_ipc(long proto = 0, unsigned flags = 0)
00968   {
00969     register unsigned w = (_pos + sizeof(l4_umword_t)-1) / sizeof(l4_umword_t);
00970     w -= _current_item * 2;
00971     return l4_msgtag(proto, w, _current_item, flags);
00972   }
00973 
00974 protected:
00975   l4_msgtag_t _tag;
00976   l4_utcb_t *_utcb;
00977   char *_current_msg;
00978   unsigned _pos;
00979   unsigned char _current_item;
00980 };
00981 
00982 
00995 class Iostream : public Istream, public Ostream
00996 {
00997 public:
00998 
01006   explicit Iostream(l4_utcb_t *utcb)
01007   : Istream(utcb), Ostream(utcb)
01008   {}
01009 
01010 
01016   void reset()
01017   {
01018     Istream::reset();
01019     Ostream::reset();
01020   }
01021 
01022 
01032 
01033   using Istream::get;
01034   using Istream::put;
01035   using Ostream::put;
01036 
01038 
01043 
01056   inline l4_msgtag_t call(l4_cap_idx_t dst);
01057   inline l4_msgtag_t call(l4_cap_idx_t dst, long label);
01058 
01071   inline l4_msgtag_t reply_and_wait(l4_umword_t *src_dst, long proto = 0)
01072   { return reply_and_wait(src_dst, L4_IPC_SEND_TIMEOUT_0, proto); }
01073 
01074   inline l4_msgtag_t send_and_wait(l4_cap_idx_t dest, l4_umword_t *src,
01075                                    long proto = 0)
01076   { return send_and_wait(dest, src, L4_IPC_SEND_TIMEOUT_0, proto); }
01077 
01091   inline l4_msgtag_t reply_and_wait(l4_umword_t *src_dst,
01092                                     l4_timeout_t timeout, long proto = 0);
01093   inline l4_msgtag_t send_and_wait(l4_cap_idx_t dest, l4_umword_t *src,
01094                                    l4_timeout_t timeout, long proto = 0);
01095   inline l4_msgtag_t reply(l4_timeout_t timeout, long proto = 0);
01096   inline l4_msgtag_t reply(long proto = 0)
01097   { return reply(L4_IPC_SEND_TIMEOUT_0, proto); }
01098 
01100 };
01101 
01102 
01103 inline bool
01104 Ostream::put_snd_item(Snd_item const &v)
01105 {
01106   typedef Snd_item T;
01107   _pos = cxx::Type_traits<Snd_item>::align(_pos);
01108   if (Utcb_stream_check::check_utcb_data_offset(_pos + sizeof(T)))
01109     return false;
01110 
01111   *(reinterpret_cast<T*>(_current_msg + _pos)) = v;
01112   _pos += sizeof(T);
01113   ++_current_item;
01114   return true;
01115 }
01116 
01117 
01118 inline bool
01119 Istream::put(Buf_item const &item)
01120 {
01121   if (_current_buf >= L4_UTCB_GENERIC_BUFFERS_SIZE - 3)
01122     return false;
01123 
01124   l4_utcb_br_u(_utcb)->bdr &= ~L4_BDR_OFFSET_MASK;
01125 
01126   reinterpret_cast<Buf_item&>(l4_utcb_br_u(_utcb)->br[_current_buf]) = item;
01127   _current_buf += 2;
01128   return true;
01129 }
01130 
01131 
01132 inline bool
01133 Istream::put(Small_buf const &item)
01134 {
01135   if (_current_buf >= L4_UTCB_GENERIC_BUFFERS_SIZE - 2)
01136     return false;
01137 
01138   l4_utcb_br_u(_utcb)->bdr &= ~L4_BDR_OFFSET_MASK;
01139 
01140   reinterpret_cast<Small_buf&>(l4_utcb_br_u(_utcb)->br[_current_buf]) = item;
01141   _current_buf += 1;
01142   return true;
01143 }
01144 
01145 
01146 inline l4_msgtag_t
01147 Ostream::send(l4_cap_idx_t dst, long proto, unsigned flags)
01148 {
01149   l4_msgtag_t tag = prepare_ipc(proto, L4_MSGTAG_FLAGS & flags);
01150   return l4_ipc_send(dst, _utcb, tag, L4_IPC_NEVER);
01151 }
01152 
01153 inline l4_msgtag_t
01154 Iostream::call(l4_cap_idx_t dst)
01155 {
01156   l4_msgtag_t tag = prepare_ipc();
01157   tag = l4_ipc_call(dst, Ostream::_utcb, tag, L4_IPC_NEVER);
01158   Istream::tag() = tag;
01159   Istream::_pos = 0;
01160   return tag;
01161 }
01162 
01163 inline l4_msgtag_t
01164 Iostream::call(l4_cap_idx_t dst, long label)
01165 {
01166   l4_msgtag_t tag = prepare_ipc(label);
01167   tag = l4_ipc_call(dst, Ostream::_utcb, tag, L4_IPC_NEVER);
01168   Istream::tag() = tag;
01169   Istream::_pos = 0;
01170   return tag;
01171 }
01172 
01173 
01174 inline l4_msgtag_t
01175 Iostream::reply_and_wait(l4_umword_t *src_dst, l4_timeout_t timeout, long proto)
01176 {
01177   l4_msgtag_t tag = prepare_ipc(proto);
01178   tag = l4_ipc_reply_and_wait(Ostream::_utcb, tag, src_dst, timeout);
01179   Istream::tag() = tag;
01180   Istream::_pos = 0;
01181   return tag;
01182 }
01183 
01184 
01185 inline l4_msgtag_t
01186 Iostream::send_and_wait(l4_cap_idx_t dest, l4_umword_t *src,
01187                         l4_timeout_t timeout, long proto)
01188 {
01189   l4_msgtag_t tag = prepare_ipc(proto);
01190   tag = l4_ipc_send_and_wait(dest, Ostream::_utcb, tag, src, timeout);
01191   Istream::tag() = tag;
01192   Istream::_pos = 0;
01193   return tag;
01194 }
01195 
01196 inline l4_msgtag_t
01197 Iostream::reply(l4_timeout_t timeout, long proto)
01198 {
01199   l4_msgtag_t tag = prepare_ipc(proto);
01200   tag = l4_ipc_send(L4_INVALID_CAP | L4_SYSF_REPLY, Ostream::_utcb, tag, timeout);
01201   Istream::tag() = tag;
01202   Istream::_pos = 0;
01203   return tag;
01204 }
01205 
01206 inline l4_msgtag_t
01207 Istream::wait(l4_umword_t *src, l4_timeout_t timeout)
01208 {
01209   l4_msgtag_t res;
01210   res = l4_ipc_wait(_utcb, src, timeout);
01211   tag() = res;
01212   _pos = 0;
01213   return res;
01214 }
01215 
01216 
01217 inline l4_msgtag_t
01218 Istream::receive(l4_cap_idx_t src, l4_timeout_t timeout)
01219 {
01220   l4_msgtag_t res;
01221   res = l4_ipc_receive(src, _utcb, timeout);
01222   tag() = res;
01223   _pos = 0;
01224   return res;
01225 }
01226 
01227 };
01228 
01229 } // namespace Ipc

01248 inline L4::Ipc::Istream &operator >> (L4::Ipc::Istream &s, unsigned char &v) { s.get(v); return s; }
01249 inline L4::Ipc::Istream &operator >> (L4::Ipc::Istream &s, signed char &v) { s.get(v); return s; }
01250 inline L4::Ipc::Istream &operator << (L4::Ipc::Istream &s, L4::Ipc::Buf_item const &v) { s.put(v); return s; }
01251 inline L4::Ipc::Istream &operator << (L4::Ipc::Istream &s, L4::Ipc::Small_buf const &v) { s.put(v); return s; }
01252 inline L4::Ipc::Istream &operator >> (L4::Ipc::Istream &s, L4::Ipc::Snd_item &v)
01253 {
01254   l4_umword_t b, d;
01255   s >> b >> d;
01256   v = L4::Ipc::Snd_item(b,d);
01257   return s;
01258 }
01259 inline L4::Ipc::Istream &operator >> (L4::Ipc::Istream &s, L4::Ipc::Varg &v)
01260 { s.get(&v); return s; }

01270 inline
01271 L4::Ipc::Istream &operator >> (L4::Ipc::Istream &s, l4_msgtag_t &v)
01272 {
01273   v = s.tag();
01274   return s;

01291 template< typename T >
01292 inline
01293 L4::Ipc::Istream &operator >> (L4::Ipc::Istream &s,
01294     L4::Ipc::Buf_in<T> const &v)
01295 {
01296   unsigned long si;
01297   s.get(si);
01298   v.set_size(si);
01299   s.get(L4::Ipc::Msg_ptr<T>(v.buf()), si);
01300   return s;
01301 }
01302 
01317 template< typename T >
01318 inline
01319 L4::Ipc::Istream &operator >> (L4::Ipc::Istream &s,
01320     L4::Ipc::Msg_ptr<T> const &v)
01321 {
01322   s.get(v);
01323   return s;
01324 }

01341     L4::Ipc::Buf_cp_in<T> const &v)
01342 {
01343   s.get(v.size());
01344   s.get(v.buf(), v.size());
01345   return s;

01405 template< typename T >
01406 inline
01407 L4::Ipc::Ostream &operator << (L4::Ipc::Ostream &s,
01408     L4::Ipc::Buf_cp_out<T> const &v)
01409 {
01410   s.put(v.size());
01411   s.put(v.buf(), v.size());
01412   return s;
01413 }
01414 
01427 inline
01428 L4::Ipc::Ostream &operator << (L4::Ipc::Ostream &s, char const *v)
01429 {
01430   unsigned long l = __builtin_strlen(v) + 1;
01431   s.put(l);
01432   s.put(v, l);
01433   return s;
01434 }
